item.title: Awk
item.description: Getting started Have a try 1 $ awk -F: '{print $1, $NF}' /etc/passwd - - - -F: Colon as a separator {...} Awk program print Prints the current record $1 First field $NF Last field /etc/passwd Input data file {.left-text} Awk program 1 2 3 4 5 BEGIN {<initializations>} <pattern 1> {<program actions>} <pattern 2> {<program actions>} .

item.title: Bash
item.description: Getting started hello.sh 1 2 3 4 #!/bin/bash VAR="world" echo "Hello $VAR!" # => Hello world! Execute the script 1 $ bash hello.sh Variables 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 NAME="John" echo ${NAME} # => John (Variables) echo $NAME # => John (Variables) echo "$NAME" # => John (Variables) echo '$NAME' # => $NAME (Exact string) echo "${NAME}!" # => John!
